snippet.title: Royal Revolt Warriors - Exclusive Gamescom Trailer
snippet.description:
From Gamescom 2024, check out the exclusive trailer that premiered at the Awesome Indies Show.

You can find us at Gamescom 2024 in Hall 10.2, E012G - D013G in the Home of Indies, but if you can't make it, you can now play the first demo of Royal Revolt Warriors at home.

Royal Revolt Warriors is a survivor-style game featuring co-op multiplayer mode and loads of fun. Choose your unique warrior and fight to protect the Kingdom.

STEAM DEMO: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3136050/Royal_Revolt_Warriors_Demo/

WISHLIST ON STEAM:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/2960490?utm_source=youtube
________________________________________________________________________
Developed and published by Uprightgames

 Read more: https://www.royalrevoltwarriors.com/🧑‍🤝‍🧑 

Join the Warriors Community: https://discord.gg/PFwtxdXG

📮Follow Upright Games: 
Instagram:  https://www.instagram.com/upright_games
Facebook:   https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61558142394955
Twitter:        https://x.comUprightGames
_________________________________________________________________________
